comments:
Build ID: M20070921-1145

Steps To Reproduce:
I'm using Eclipse v3.3.1 M20070921-1145, Mylyn v2.0.0 200070627-1400, I also have Subclipse installed, but the Subclipse Mylyn Integration is disabled. 

I get the above exception in the log every time Eclipse starts.

I'm seeing similar problems to the ones described in bug 205673. This could also be connected to bug 200220.

I just wanted to add that the problem started after updating to Eclipse v3.3.1.

Note that these warnings are innocuous as far as we know.  Do you see this on every restart, or just on the first restart?

*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of bug 188524 ***
